Class QuizServer

  • java.lang.Object

  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.rmi.Remote, QuizService

    public class QuizServer
extends java.rmi.server.UnicastRemoteObject
implements QuizService
    an implementation of the quiz service.
